body.para: Common measurement interface can be enabled/disabled by specifying the corresponding M codes.

list.li: M1966 - Enables common measurement interface function
M1965 - Disables common measurement interface function

body.para: Enable signal control at the beginning of measurement and disable this function at the end of measurement.
Variables for signal control are also used in other functions. When common measurement interface is enabled, all functions that use variables are disabled until M1965 is issued.
